system:
note description: "Summary description for {../tracker/history.xmlHISTORY}." author: "" date: "$Date$" revision: "$Revision$"
class ../tracker/history.xmlHISTORY
create ../tracker/history.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} --Instantiation
f_make../tracker/history.xml#f_makemake do create ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falsemake end
feature {../tracker/history.xmlHISTORY} -- Attributes
f_record../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord: FalseLINKED_LIST [../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND]
feature -- Deleation
f_reset_record_and_append../tracker/history.xml#f_reset_record_and_appendreset_record_and_append (c: ../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND) do ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falsewipe_out ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseextend (c) ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falsefinish end
f_remove_all_right../tracker/history.xml#f_remove_all_rightremove_all_right --remove all items to the right of the cursor do from until ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseislast or else ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseis_empty loop if ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falsecount /= ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseindex then ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseremove_right end end end
feature -- Setters
f_add_to_record../tracker/history.xml#f_add_to_recordadd_to_record (c: ../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND) -- add a COMMAND object to record do ../tracker/history.xml#f_remove_all_rightremove_all_right ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseextend (c) ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord.Falseforth end
feature -- Getters
f_get_record../tracker/history.xml#f_get_recordget_record: FalseLINKED_LIST [../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND] do Result := ../tracker/history.xml#f_recordrecord end
end -- class ../tracker/history.xmlHISTORY
